title: Mahi-Mahi Matrimony
description: She just got dumped at the altar.The honeymoon is already paid for and one certainly can't waste a trip to The Turks and Caicos Islands!The hunky but irritating captain of the fishing boat is not who he appears to be...Mahi-Mahi Matrimony is a funny, poignant, sweet love story about Julie, who was left at the altar by her two-timing fianc√©e/boss.Since the sailing honeymoon is already paid for, two weeks in the Caribbean is just the thing she needs to take her mind off her troubles.No husband.No job.No deadlines.Blue skies.Bright sun.Miles of open water.What could go wrong?His name is Zan.Alexander Roland DeKeurge, billionaire and philanthropist.And just what do pirates, turtles, and donkeys have to do with anything?
author: Pat Adeff
